Submodules

RecommendationSystem.DB.utils module

RecommendationSystem.DB.utils.get_all_article() → List

Gets all article from the db which embedding is not null :return: All articles from the database whose embedding is not NULL

RecommendationSystem.DB.utils.get_all_comments_for_given_article(article: Article) → List[Comment]

Returns all comments connected to the given article :param article: Article node :return: List of all comment nodes that are connected with the given article node

RecommendationSystem.DB.utils.get_article_by_id(article_id: int) → Article

Gets a specific article by the given id :param article_id: ID of article node :return: Article node with given ID

RecommendationSystem.DB.utils.get_article_by_title(title: str) → Article

Gets a specific article by the give title :param title: Title of the article :return: Article node with given title

RecommendationSystem.DB.utils.get_articles_without_embedding()

Gets all article without an embedding :return:

RecommendationSystem.DB.utils.get_comment_by_id(comment_id: int) → Comment

Gets a specific comment by the given id :param comment_id: ID of the comment :return: Comment node with given ID

RecommendationSystem.DB.utils.get_comments_without_embedding()

Gets all comments without an embedding :return:

RecommendationSystem.DB.utils.run_cypher_query(query: str, node_type) → List

Runs a give cypher query to handle special cases :param query: Cypher query string to extract specific data from the Neo4J database :param node_type: Type of the expected node to be returned :return: List of nodes for the given cypher query

RecommendationSystem.DB.utils.update_node_with_embedding(node: StructuredNode, embedding: Tensor)

Updates the given node with the given embedding :param node: :param embedding: :return:
